Package com.ironhack.MidtermProject.controller.interfaces.users

Interface AccountHolderControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountHolderController
public interface AccountHolderControllerInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.math.BigDecimal checkAccountBalance​(java.lang.Integer accountId, java.lang.Integer userId)
    Allows AccountHolder users to check balance from their accounts.
    void createAccountHolder​(java.lang.Integer adminId, AccountHolder accountHolders)
    Allows admins to create new account holders.
    java.util.List<AccountHolder> findAll()
    Find all AccountHolder users created.
    AccountHolder findById​(java.lang.Integer id)
    Find AccountHolder by id.
    AccountHolder loginAccountHolder​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
    Allows AccountHolder users to login into their accounts.
    AccountHolder logoutAccountHolder​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
    Allows AccountHolder users to logout from their accounts.
    void transferAmount​(Transference transference)
    Allows account holder users to transfer money from their accounts to others.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      java.util.List<AccountHolder> findAll()
      Find all AccountHolder users created.
      Returns:
      a list of account holder users.

    • findById

      AccountHolder findById​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Find AccountHolder by id.
      Parameters:
      id - receives an integer id of user.
      Returns:
      an AccountHolder user corresponding to that id.

    • checkAccountBalance

      java.math.BigDecimal checkAccountBalance​(java.lang.Integer accountId, java.lang.Integer userId)
      Allows AccountHolder users to check balance from their accounts.
      Parameters:
      accountId - receives an integer with id from account.
      userId - receives an integer with id from account holder.
      Returns:
      a BigDecimal with balance from account.

    • loginAccountHolder

      AccountHolder loginAccountHolder​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
      Allows AccountHolder users to login into their accounts.
      Parameters:
      loginAccount - receives a LoginAccount where the user enters their id and corresponding password.
      Returns:
      an AccountHolder logged in.

    • logoutAccountHolder

      AccountHolder logoutAccountHolder​(LoginAccount loginAccount)
      Allows AccountHolder users to logout from their accounts.
      Parameters:
      loginAccount - receives a LoginAccount where the user enters their id and corresponding password.
      Returns:
      an AccountHolder logged out.

    • createAccountHolder

      void createAccountHolder​(java.lang.Integer adminId, AccountHolder accountHolders)
      Allows admins to create new account holders.
      Parameters:
      adminId - receives an integer with id from admin.
      accountHolders - receives an AccountHolder with personal information needed to create that user.

    • transferAmount

      void transferAmount​(Transference transference)
      Allows account holder users to transfer money from their accounts to others.
      Parameters:
      transference - receives a Transference with all information needed to make that transaction.
